ModMetaData.name: Simply Hyperweave
ModMetaData.author: Coca
ModMetaData.description:
Version: 1.0-1.5
This mod adds craftable Hyperweave as recipes for the machining work tables.
New research requirements (1500/spacer) to develop methods of crafting Hyperweave, prerequisites machining. Once researched, the Machining table have 1x and 4x recipes to make Hyperweave.
Machinery: 25x Platesteel + 100x Cloth + 1000 work => 50x Hyperweave 100x Platesteel + 400x Cloth + 2000 work => 200x Hyperweave
